<Link id="l00080" /><CodeLine lineNumber="80"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// If set to true, all sections in each object file will be allocated using</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00089" /><CodeLine lineNumber="89"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Instructs this RTDyldLinkingLayer2 instance to override the symbol flags</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00090" /><CodeLine lineNumber="90"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// returned by RuntimeDyld for any given object file with the flags supplied</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00091" /><CodeLine lineNumber="91"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// by the MaterializationResponsibility instance. This is a workaround to</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00092" /><CodeLine lineNumber="92"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// support symbol visibility in COFF, which does not use the libObject&#39;s</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00093" /><CodeLine lineNumber="93"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// SF&#95;Exported flag. Use only when generating / adding COFF object files.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00094" /><CodeLine lineNumber="94"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00095" /><CodeLine lineNumber="95"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// FIXME: We should be able to remove this if/when COFF properly tracks</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00096" /><CodeLine lineNumber="96"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// exported symbols.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00097" /><CodeLine lineNumber="97"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/orc/rtdyldobjectlinkinglayer">RTDyldObjectLinkingLayer</a> &amp;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00101" /><CodeLine lineNumber="101"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00102" /><CodeLine lineNumber="102"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00103" /><CodeLine lineNumber="103"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// If set, this RTDyldObjectLinkingLayer instance will claim responsibility</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00104" /><CodeLine lineNumber="104"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// for any symbols provided by a given object file that were not already in</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00105" /><CodeLine lineNumber="105"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// the MaterializationResponsibility instance. Setting this flag allows</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00106" /><CodeLine lineNumber="106"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// higher-level program representations (e.g. LLVM IR) to be added based on</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00107" /><CodeLine lineNumber="107"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// only a subset of the symbols they provide, without having to write</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00108" /><CodeLine lineNumber="108"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// intervening layers to scan and add the additional symbols. This trades</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00109" /><CodeLine lineNumber="109"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// diagnostic quality for convenience however: If all symbols are enumerated</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00110" /><CodeLine lineNumber="110"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// up-front then clashes can be detected and reported early (and usually</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00111" /><CodeLine lineNumber="111"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// deterministically). If this option is set, clashes for the additional</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00112" /><CodeLine lineNumber="112"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// symbols may not be detected until late, and detection may depend on</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00113" /><CodeLine lineNumber="113"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// the flow of control through JIT&#39;d code. Use with care.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00114" /><CodeLine lineNumber="114"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/orc/rtdyldobjectlinkinglayer">RTDyldObjectLinkingLayer</a> &amp;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00115" /><CodeLine lineNumber="115" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/orc/rtdyldobjectlinkinglayer/#aa5fd9509ea64f5d3780326dea9b50424"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/orc/rtdyldobjectlinkinglayer/#aa5fd9509ea64f5d3780326dea9b50424">setAutoClaimResponsibilityForObjectSymbols</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> AutoClaimObjectSymbols) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00116" /><CodeLine lineNumber="116"><Highlight kind="normal">    this-&gt;AutoClaimObjectSymbols = AutoClaimObjectSymbols;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00117" /><CodeLine lineNumber="117"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#42;</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">this</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00118" /><CodeLine lineNumber="118"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
